"use client" import { motion } from "framer-motion" import { useInView } from "react-intersection-observer" import Image from "next/image" export default function About() { const [ref, inView] = useInView({ triggerOnce: true, threshold: 0.1, }) return (

About Me

Backend Developer | Cloud & Data Enthusiast

I'm a passionate software developer with 2 years of experience at Accenture, currently pursuing a Master's in Computer Science. I specialize in backend development using Java, Spring Boot, and FastAPI, with hands-on expertise in cloud platforms like AWS and Google Cloud.

I’ve built scalable applications including a real-time currency converter, a customer management portal, and a cloud-deployed physiotherapy website. My skillset spans REST APIs, Docker, Kubernetes, SQL, NoSQL, Power BI, and machine learning tools like TensorFlow and ElasticSearch.

Name:

Pankaj Jagtap

Email:

jagtap.pa@northeastern.edu

Location:

Chicago, IL

Phone:

) }
